title: Dr. Fauci: I have 'a very good relationship' with Trump
description: Top infectious disease expert Dr. Anthony Fauci, a member of the White House coronavirus task force, told CNN's David Axelrod on "The Axe Files" podcast that he has "a very good relationship" with President Donald Trump.

title: He battled Covid-19 for 128 days. Here's what he wants you to know
description: "Miracle" Larry Kelly recovered from being infected with coronavirus. He spoke to CNN's Brianna Keilar about his experience after 128 days of hospitalization.

title: Trump explains why he is cancelling Republican convention in Florida
description: President Donald Trump announced that there will not be Republican convention activities in Jacksonville, Florida.

title: Here's what's in the Republican's stimulus proposal
description: CNN's Manu Raju reports on what is in the GOP stimulus proposal and what President Trump was not able to include in the plan.

title: Crowd saves two children from burning building
description: The two siblings, aged three and ten, escaped a fire that broke out, according to CNN affiliate BFMTV.

title: Ancient Roman artifacts found in seafood store
description: During a routine inspection in a seafood store, authorities in Spain discovered 13 Roman amphorae that could date back to the first century.

title: Taylor Swift will drop a surprise new album tonight
description: Surprise! Taylor Swift is releasing a new album this week, one she wrote and recorded entirely in isolation.

title: Portland mayor tear gassed after speaking with protesters on presence of federal agents
description: • ANALYSIS: US presidents generally don't try to invade their own country

title: CNN analyst: President Trump's motives are 'highly suspect'
description: CNN's Rosemary Church speaks with CNN Global Affairs Analyst Max Boot who says President Donald Trump is "demonizing" China for domestic political gain rather than as part of a comprehensive strategy.

title: One Direction's most iconic moments, as the band celebrates 10-year anniversary
description: Today is One Direction's 10-year anniversary, and patient fans have been promised something special to mark the occasion.

title: Trump joins Republicans who are criticizing Liz Cheney
description: President Donald Trump on Thursday joined Republicans who are publicly criticizing GOP Rep. Liz Cheney, who has broken with the President in regard to American military engagement overseas and support for Dr. Anthony Fauci during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Nine-year-old-girl is the youngest to die from coronavirus in Florida, state health officials say
description: A 9-year-old girl from Putnam County is the youngest person to have died in Florida from coronavirus complications, according to the state department of health.

title: Hurricane Douglas rapidly intensified into a major hurricane as it moves toward Hawaii
description: Douglas has rapidly intensified into a Category 3 hurricane on Thursday with wind speeds of 120 mph.

title: Liverpool lifts 'special' Premier League title after thrilling victory against Chelsea
description: Liverpool finally got its hands on the English Premier League trophy following an action-packed 5-3 win against Chelsea at Anfield.

title: Portland mayor tear gassed after speaking with protesters on presence of federal agents
Ancient Roman artifacts discovered by police in Spanish seafood store
description: Authorities inspecting a seafood store in Spain have discovered a collection of ancient Roman containers, called amphorae, some of which could have been created in the first century and recovered from shipwrecks off the Mediterranean coast.

title: Restauranteurs serve Netanyahu a 'final meal' as chaos mounts over Israel's coronavirus restrictions
description: The pressure on Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is building as quickly as the protests, with his official residence on Balfour Street now the focal point of protests that are growing in frequency and in size.

title: Gymnastics Australia promises action after multiple former athletes allege mental and physical abuse
description: Australia's gymnastics federation has promised to take action after multiple former gymnasts allege they were subject to emotional and physical abuse during their careers.

title: Trump puts self-preservation above the pandemic
description:
• Latest on coronavirus: Birx and Fauci express concern as Trump paints a rosy picture 
• America is still far from containing Covid-19, just look at the numbers 
• Trump asked why there are no medical experts at briefing. Hear his response

title: Former Nazi camp guard convicted of 5,230 counts of accessory to murder
description: A former Nazi concentration camp guard was convicted of thousands of counts of being an accessory to murder and given a two-year suspended prison sentence Thursday, a court announced.

title: Why the sports world needs fake crowd noise — and late-night comedy doesn't
description: Over the last couple of weekends, I have been able to feed my hunger for sports diversion by watching golf tournaments and occasional matches of Premier League soccer.

title: Fox News parts ways with a morning host who caused a Covid-19 scare
description: Fox News has parted ways with a host who dismayed fellow staffers when she came to work while visibly sick in the early days of the coronavirus crisis.

title: Boko Haram militants kill five hostages kidnapped in Nigeria's northeast, UN says
description: Boko Haram militants have killed five hostages, including four aid workers, who were abducted last month in northeastern Nigeria, a UN spokeswoman told CNN on Thursday.

title: US move to shut China's Houston consulate draws questions about  motives
description:
• Video appears to show paper-burning at Chinese consulate after US orders it to close
• US defense chief pushes allies to challenge 'bullying' China

title: TikTok could be sold to American investors to avert US ban, reports say
description: Could an American takeover of TikTok save it from being locked out of the United States?

title: Where is the US tourist, Italy asks
description: Americans have long had a love affair with Italy. This summer, that love affair is on hiatus, and Italy is feeling the heartache.

title: Separated couples fight for travel exemptions, say 'love is essential'
description: "We are in a REAL relationship," Michael Ibeam Cline says as he explains why he and Elena Guerrero, his "love," deserve to be together.

title: These young medics are fighting Covid-19 misinformation in 30 languages
description: Determined to protect minority communities from Covid-19 misinformation, a group of young doctors set about offering health information in over 30 languages.

title: Taiwan's parliament approves proposal to rename China Airlines
description: Renaming a company is always going to be a complicated undertaking, but rarely does it hit the levels of controversy currently swirling around China Airlines, Taiwan's largest air carrier.

title: Republican lawmaker slams Trump's remark: 'Unacceptably obtuse'
description: After President Donald Trump sent well wishes to former Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell, who faces charges for recruiting, grooming and ultimately sexually abusing minors as young as 14 as Epstein's alleged accomplice, a former business partner of Epstein's says Trump and Maxwell "knew each other well." CNN's Pamela Brown reports.

title: Tensions between the US and China have continued to ratchet up following the forced closure by Washington of Beijing's consulate in Houston
Kim Kardashian West addresses Kanye's mental health after his Twitter meltdown
description: Kim Kardashian West has shared a message about her husband Kanye West and mental health.

title: Mars is the latest arena in the US-China rivalry, with both countries launching probes this month
description: Two years after humans last landed a probe on Mars, both the United States and China are launching missions to the red planet this month and setting up a new arena for their growing rivalry.

title: Waiting another year to witness Biles defy physics
description: This was supposed to be a week of celebration in Tokyo. Japan would be opening its doors to the world and launching the 32nd Olympiad in the capital.

title: All-female round the world voyage hunts for pollution hotspots
description: Eight hundred miles from land in the Pacific Ocean, Emily Penn had a revelation. It was the late 2000s and she was working aboard the boat Earthrace as it circumnavigated the globe. Jumping overboard for a wash, she saw a toothbrush floating by. Then a cigarette lighter. Then a bottle top. Then hundreds of plastic fragments came into view. "It just didn't make any sense," she recalls.

title: China's 'dark' fishing fleet may be the reason 'ghost ships' washed up in Japan: NGO
description: The dead just kept coming in 2017.

title: The all-female crew sailing the world to study plastic pollution
description: Emily Penn has studied marine plastic pollution for years. Then she discovered the issue may disproportionately affect women, so she put together an all-female crew to research the problem.

title: Woman invites governor to funeral after mom's Covid-19 death
description: A woman whose mother died of Covid-19 says Texas Gov. Greg Abbott is invited to the funeral, calling out the government's inaction.

title: Police officer charged for pepper spraying Black Lives Matter protesters, prosecutors say
description: A Philadelphia police officer is facing criminal assault charges for allegedly pepper spraying three protesters without provocation, according to the Philadelphia District Attorney's Office.

title: China harboring military-linked fugitive scientist at San Francisco consulate, FBI says
Why this country has so many coronavirus skeptics
description: Not only do some Mexicans not believe in the severity of Covid-19, they don't believe it exists at all. This comes as the country sees hundreds of thousands of confirmed coronavirus cases and at least 40,000 deaths. CNN's Matt Rivers speaks with sociologists and people on the street about why so many Mexicans are skeptical of the virus.

title: Hear why band decided to change their name
description: Band member Emily Strayer tells CNN's Don Lemon why "The Chicks" opted to drop the word "Dixie" from their band name.

title: A Netflix dating show has sparked major debate about colorism
description: On Netflix's "Indian Matchmaking," marriage consultant Sima Taparia travels the world to meet with hopeful clients and help them find the perfect match for an arranged marriage.

title: CNN's Don Lemon: This White House really has some nerve
description: CNN's Don Lemon gives his take on the White House's response to former Vice President Joe Biden after he said Donald Trump was the first racist to win the presidency.

title: A typo on a death certificate exposes a man allegedly trying to avoid prison
description: A Long Island man allegedly created a fake death certificate to avoid being sentenced for unrelated charges but a typo on the certificate gave him away, prosecutors said.

title: Trump asked why there are no medical experts at briefing. Hear his response
description: During a coronavirus news conference, CNN's Kaitlan Collins asks President Donald Trump why he appeared alone without public health experts at his side.

title: Mike Pompeo is botching his job
description: Just when you thought Mike Pompeo's reputation couldn't sink any lower, along comes the blatantly ideological and highly politicized report of his Commission on Unalienable Rights.
